PBR.SCHEDULE_ID IS NULL
PBR.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
ORDER BY P.NAME
SELECT SCHEDULE_ID, MATCH_DATE, STATUS, NOTE FROM MATCH_SCHEDULE ORDER BY SCHEDULE_ID DESC
SELECT SCHEDULE_ID, MATCH_DATE, STATUS, NOTE FROM MATCH_SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAYERS ( NAME, POSITION, SECONDARY_POSITION, JOIN_DATE, ACTIVE_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{position}, #{secondaryPosition}, NULL, 'ACTIVE' )

INSERT INTO PLAYERBASERATINGS ( PLAYER_ID, ATTACK_SCORE, DEFENSE_SCORE, STAMINA_SCORE, SPEED_SCORE, TECHNIQUE_SCORE, TEAMWORK_SCORE, LAST_UPDATED, SCHEDULE_ID, PARTICIPATION_YN ) VALUES ( #{playerId}, #{attackScore}, #{defenseScore}, #{staminaScore}, #{speedScore}, #{techniqueScore}, #{teamworkScore}, STR_TO_DATE(REGEXP_REPLACE(#{matchDate}, '\\([^)]*\\)', ''), '%Y. %m. %d.'), #{scheduleId}, #{participationYn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAYERBASERATINGS SET ATTACK_SCORE = #{attackScore}, DEFENSE_SCORE = #{defenseScore}, STAMINA_SCORE = #{staminaScore}, SPEED_SCORE = #{speedScore}, TECHNIQUE_SCORE = #{techniqueScore}, TEAMWORK_SCORE = #{teamworkScore}, PARTICIPATION_YN = #{participationYn}, LAST_UPDATED = STR_TO_DATE(REGEXP_REPLACE(#{matchDate}, '\\([^)]*\\)', ''), '%Y. %m. %d.') WHERE RATING_ID = #{ratingId}
mapper.select:
WITH -- 기본 평가 점수(LAST_UPDATED와 SCHEDULE_ID가 NULL인 데이터) BASE_RATINGS AS ( SELECT PLAYER_ID, ATTACK_SCORE AS BASE_ATTACK, DEFENSE_SCORE AS BASE_DEFENSE, STAMINA_SCORE AS BASE_STAMINA, SPEED_SCORE AS BASE_SPEED, TECHNIQUE_SCORE AS BASE_TECHNIQUE, TEAMWORK_SCORE AS BASE_TEAMWORK FROM PLAYERBASERATINGS WHERE LAST_UPDATED IS NULL AND SCHEDULE_ID IS NULL ),
-- 최근 한 달간의 평가 점수 중 참여한 데이터(PARTICIPATION_YN = 'Y')의 평균 RECENT_RATINGS AS ( SELECT PLAYER_ID, AVG(ATTACK_SCORE) AS AVG_ATTACK, AVG(DEFENSE_SCORE) AS AVG_DEFENSE, AVG(STAMINA_SCORE) AS AVG_STAMINA, AVG(SPEED_SCORE) AS AVG_SPEED, AVG(TECHNIQUE_SCORE) AS AVG_TECHNIQUE, AVG(TEAMWORK_SCORE) AS AVG_TEAMWORK, COUNT(*) AS PARTICIPATION_COUNT FROM PLAYERBASERATINGS WHERE LAST_UPDATED >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND PARTICIPATION_YN = 'Y' AND SCHEDULE_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PLAYER_ID HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 )
-- 최종 결과: 기본 평가(가중치 5)와 최근 평가 평균(가중치 5)을 합산 SELECT P.PLAYER_ID, P.NAME, P.POSITION, P.SECONDARY_POSITION, -- 기본 평가가 없으면 최근 평가만, 최근 평가가 없으면 기본 평가만 사용 -- 둘 다 있으면 가중 평균 계산 (기본 평가 가중치 5, 최근 평가 가중치 5) ROUND( IFNULL((BR.BASE_ATTACK * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_ATTACK, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_ATTACK, 0)) , 1) AS AVG_ATTACK,
ROUND( IFNULL((BR.BASE_DEFENSE * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_DEFENSE, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_DEFENSE, 0)) , 1) AS AVG_DEFENSE,
ROUND( IFNULL((BR.BASE_STAMINA * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_STAMINA, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_STAMINA, 0)) , 1) AS AVG_STAMINA,
ROUND( IFNULL((BR.BASE_SPEED * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_SPEED, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_SPEED, 0)) , 1) AS AVG_SPEED,
ROUND( IFNULL((BR.BASE_TECHNIQUE * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_TECHNIQUE, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_TECHNIQUE, 0)) , 1) AS AVG_TECHNIQUE,
ROUND( IFNULL((BR.BASE_TEAMWORK * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_TEAMWORK, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_TEAMWORK, 0)) , 1) AS AVG_TEAMWORK,
-- 종합 평균 점수 (모든 영역의 평균) ROUND( ( IFNULL((BR.BASE_ATTACK * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_ATTACK, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_ATTACK, 0)) +
IFNULL((BR.BASE_DEFENSE * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_DEFENSE, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_DEFENSE, 0)) +
IFNULL((BR.BASE_STAMINA * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_STAMINA, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_STAMINA, 0)) +
IFNULL((BR.BASE_SPEED * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_SPEED, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_SPEED, 0)) +
IFNULL((BR.BASE_TECHNIQUE * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_TECHNIQUE, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_TECHNIQUE, 0)) +
IFNULL((BR.BASE_TEAMWORK * 5 + IFNULL(RR.AVG_TEAMWORK, 0) * 5) / CASE WHEN RR.PLAYER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 10 ELSE 5 END, IFNULL(RR.AVG_TEAMWORK, 0)) ) / 6 , 1) AS TOTAL_AVERAGE,
-- 참여 횟수 IFNULL(RR.PARTICIPATION_COUNT, 0) AS PARTICIPATION_COUNT FROM PLAYERS P LEFT JOIN BASE_RATINGS BR ON P.PLAYER_ID = BR.PLAYER_ID LEFT JOIN RECENT_RATINGS RR ON P.PLAYER_ID = RR.PLAYER_ID ORDER BY TOTAL_AVERAGE DESC, P.NAME

SELECT P.PLAYER_ID, P.NAME, P.POSITION, P.ACTIVE_STATUS, PBR.RATING_ID, PBR.ATTACK_SCORE, PBR.DEFENSE_SCORE, PBR.STAMINA_SCORE, PBR.SPEED_SCORE, PBR.TECHNIQUE_SCORE, PBR.TEAMWORK_SCORE, PBR.LAST_UPDATED, PBR.SCHEDULE_ID, PBR.PARTICIPATION_YN, MS.MATCH_DATE FROM PLAYERS P LEFT JOIN PLAYERBASERATINGS PBR ON P.PLAYER_ID = PBR.PLAYER_ID INNER JOIN MATCH_SCHEDULE MS ON PBR.SCHEDULE_ID = MS.SCHEDULE_ID WHERE P.PLAYER_ID = #{playerId} AND PBR.PARTICIPATION_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MS.MATCH_DATE DESC LIMIT 5
